# Context
Why do you need this feature?

Please provide context for this feature request. What problem does it solve or what benefit does it provide?

# Description
How would you like this feature to work?

Please describe how you envision this feature working. Include any specific details, examples and attachments that would help us understand your request.

# Acceptance Criteria
What are the criteria for this feature to be considered complete?

Please list the acceptance criteria for this feature. This will help us understand when the feature is complete and ready for review.

# Additional Information
Is there anything else we should know?

Please provide any additional information that may be relevant to this feature request like screenshots, links to related issues, or any other context that would help us understand your request.
